sourcesContent:
import {useState} from "react"; //import firebase from 'firebase/compat/app'; import {db} from "../../firebase" function MentorForm() { const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(""); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(""); const [discord, setDiscord] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [city, setCity] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoader(true); db.collection("mentors") .add({ userName: userName, password:password, firstName:firstName, lastName:lastName, discord:discord, address:address, city:city, country:country, postalCode:postalCode, email: email, message: message, }) .then(() => { setLoader(false); alert("Your message has been submittedüëç"); }) .catch((error) => { alert(error.message); setLoader(false); }); setUserName(""); setEmail(""); setFirstName(""); setLastName(""); setDiscord(""); setPassword(""); setAddress(""); setCity(""); setCountry(""); setPostalCode(""); setMessage(""); }; return (
Register as a Mentor
User Information
setUserName(e.target.value)}/>
setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="jesse@example.com"/>
setFirstName(e.target.value)}/>
setLastName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Jesse"/>
setPassword(e.target.value)}/>
setDiscord(e.target.value)}/>
Contact Information
setAddress(e.target.value)} placeholder="Bld Mihail Kogalniceanu, nr. 8 Bl 1, Sc 1, Ap 09"/>
setCity(e.target.value)}/>
setCountry(e.target.value)} />
setPostalCode(e.target.value)}/>
About Me
) } export default MentorForm
